name: 3D Safari Parking Free - Realistic Lion, Rhino, Elephant, and Zebra Adventure Simulator Games
name_original: 3D Safari Parking Free - Realistic Lion, Rhino, Elephant, and Zebra Adventure Simulator Games
description:
** LOTS OF AMAZING ANIMALS! **
** SUPER HD 3D GRAPHICS! **

It's time to go on a safari! In a new TWIST of the classic parking games, not only are your driving and parking skills put to the test, but now you must avoid LIVE ANIMALS as you drive around taking pictures of all amazing animals.

You'll come across elephants, zebras, hippos, rhinos, lions, and more -- and they just LOVE to get in your way! You will have to be careful though, because the rhinos and lions love to attack cars that disturb them.

HOW TO PLAY

You must carefully drive your safari truck around without disturbing the wildlife. Follow the green markets until you come across a round circular parking zone. Once you park on the special parking zone, you'll then be able to take several nice pics of the animals. However, if you are not careful, you will scare the wildlife and they will run away... some will even attack you, so you have to be careful!

FEATURES

- Live animals! Have to be careful not to run them over!
- Realistic 3D graphics.
- Multi direction camera controls.
- 10 levels to complete.
